Package com.lukflug.panelstudio

Interface FixedComponent

All Superinterfaces:
Component
All Known Implementing Classes:
DraggableContainer, HUDComponent, HUDPanel, ListComponent, TabGUI
public interface FixedComponent
extends Component
Interface representing a Component that has a fixed position (i.e. the position isn't determined by the parent via Context).

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.awt.Point getPosition​(Interface inter)
    Get the current component position.
    int getWidth​(Interface inter)
    Get the component width.

    Loads the component state

    Saves the component state
    void setPosition​(Interface inter, java.awt.Point position)
    Set the current component position.

    Methods inherited from interface com.lukflug.panelstudio.Component

    exit, getHeight, getTitle, handleButton, handleKey, handleScroll, releaseFocus, render
